    [align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/NotableThreads.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131]Ariana[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]

No Announcement Threads have been made this week!

[b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5328124][b][Metasploit]Deface a website using Metasploit tutorial-By Spirit[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2860712][color=#EFEFEF][b]spirited_wolf[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Not too often will you see a hacking tutorial in the HF News. Time to change that up. Come here to check out a highly detailed tutorial on how to deface a website using metasploit.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5328467][b][Tutorial] How to extract the vocals from a song[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3146143][color=#EFEFEF][b]Alegra[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]For anyone into music production or wanting to learn something new this is for you. Ever wanted to extract lyrics from a song? Here is how.

[b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5328456][b]Does anyone know their BTC address by memory?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1610871][color=#EFEFEF][b]Rʏᴀɴ Rᴇʏɴᴏʟᴅs ❤️[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Do you have your BTC address memorized by heart? Share here if you do or do not!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5327705][b]Beach or Pool? | Poll[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3176104][color=#EFEFEF][b]Prince Tony[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Which do you prefer going to? The beach or the pool?

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5328215][b]Trump is my daddy[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1401500][color=#00AAFF][b]Fatboy Slim[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Fatboy Slim created a very interesting thread stating that Donald Trump was his "daddy".

[b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5327121][b][$20] Come up with a name for a tech startup[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2685110][color=#EFEFEF][b]Zymbiotic[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]If you can think of a cool and creative name for a tech company post it here.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5326799][b]Who wants GIFT AWARD?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2360425][color=#EFEFEF][b]FamousHater[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]FamousHater with yet another generous giveaway. If you want the gift award enter this contest today!

[b][color=white][u]Member Feedback Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5327055][b]Queen 4ever - ? years feedback[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2504443][color=#00AAFF][b]reve4 neeuQ[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]The almighty scholar for the Hack Forums news team has created a short and sweet feedback thread.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5325422][b]thales' 3k post / almost 2 year feedback thread[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2448195][color=#00AAFF][b]thale[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]A really nice, lenghty feedback by the member thale. Congrats on 3,000 posts and almost two years of membership!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5326841][b]The Grim - 6 years Feedback[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=431105][color=#EFEFEF][b]Tɦɛ Gʀiɱ[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Tɦɛ Gʀiɱ has been a member of Hack Forums for over six years now. In that time-frame, Tɦɛ Gʀiɱ, has accomplished many different things. To celebrate these achievements, Tɦɛ Gʀiɱ, has created a feedback thread.

[b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5327508][b]Fuck Kevin Durant[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1203712][color=#00AAFF][b]iKinky[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]What is your opinions on Kevin Durant going to the Warriors?

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5328390][b]Clinton hid thousands of emails but shouldn't be charged - FBI[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1571789][color=#99FF00][b]Duramax[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Looks like no criminal charges will be brought to America's former Secretary of State.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5328052][b]On gender[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2626380][color=#99FF00][b]poppingbubbles[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Did you just assume their gender? Post your thoughts on today's genders, whether you think there are only two, or if you believe that there can be more than two.

[color=#333333]---[/color][b][color=white][u]Note from Ari[/u][/color][/b] 
[color=#333333]---[/color]Please report any informational threads on our [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5264513]Weekly Reports[/url] thread to make it easier for journalists to do their jobs.

    [color=transparent]       [/color]

    [color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2214473].Sinister[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[b][color=white]Happy Birthday America![/color][/b]
On behalf of the entire HF News Team, we hope you had a safe 4th of July!

[i]Focus on what makes you happy and what gives meaning to your life.[/i]

    [color=transparent]       [/color]

    [align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/WorldNews.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2776397]Young Thug[/url][/i][/b][/align]


[url=http://www.nbcnews.com/news/world/bangladesh-attack-u-s-citizen-among-20-foreigners-killed-dhaka-n602866][b][color=white]Attacks in Bangladesh result in 20 foreigners dead[/color][/b][/url]
A 10-hour standoff between six terrorists, with 20 foreign hostages, and Bangladesh commandos was ended when the commandos stormed the bakery where the terrorists were holed up, which resulted in the death of the terrorists, and soon before, the hostages.  The Islamic State has claimed responsibility for these attacks.  There were several Muslim hostages inside, but they were all released unharmed.  The father of one of the hostages stated that the gunmen killed anyone who could not recite a verse from the Quran.  Among the dead were nine Italians, seven Japanese, and one American.  The rest have yet to be identified.

[url=http://time.com/4392333/elie-wiesel-dead-global-mourning/][b][color=white]Elie Wiesel dies at age 87[/color][/b][/url]
Elie Wiesel, Holocaust survivor and Nobel Peace prize winner, died today, Saturday, July 2 2016.  His death caused such grief that public figures such as Nancy Pelosi, Mitt Romney, and even President Barack Obama commented on the tragedy.  Elie was sent to Auschwitz when he was just 15, and was the only survivor in his family.  President Barack Obama called Wiesel “one of the great moral voices of our time, and in many ways, the conscience of the world”  With Elie dies a ray of light that guided so many in this world, he truly will be missed by many.

[url=http://www.bbc.com/news/election-us-2016-36695722][b][color=white]FBI questions Clinton on infamous emails[/color][/b][/url]
"US presidential candidate Hillary Clinton has been questioned by the FBI over her use of emails while she was secretary of state, her campaign says."  The bureau is investigating whether classified information was leaked via a private email server.  Clinton denies the leaking of any classified information within the emails, however, the FBI intends to get to the bottom of that.  Clinton claims the email server was simply for convenience, for her Blackberry made it too difficult to email efficiently.  What remains to be seen is the effect this will have on Clinton's campaign.  Democrats worry it will give her Republican opponent Donald Trump ammunition to portray her as untrustworthy. The public awaits the results with bated breath.

    [color=transparent]   [/color]

    [align=center]
[img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/TechNews.png[/img]
[i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1730460][b]Gladly[/b][/url][/i][/align]

[align=left][url=http://www.theregister.co.uk/2016/06/27/woman_microsoft_windows_10_upgrades/][b]Woman Sues Microsoft for Forced Upgrade to Windows 10, Wins $10K[/b][/url]
In what may be an important case for business owners who have crucial systems upgrading without their permission, a woman from California has successfully taken Microsoft to court, and it ended in success. According to the woman, after switching to Windows 10, her business computer began to have poor performance and constantly crash, making it unusable. She also claimed that she tried contacting Microsoft multiple times, but to no avail. A big reason for the win was the fact that the California woman took Microsoft to small claims court, meaning Microsoft could not send their lawyers, and instead sent a representative for the company. The $10,000 awarded to her by a California judge will cover litigation costs, as well as the cost for purchasing a new computer.  

[url=http://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2016/06/oneplus-3-review-a-great-400-phone-you-can-actually-buy/][b]OnePlus Releases OnePlus 3, a Low Budget Powerhouse Flagship[/b][/url]
OnePlus, the company notorious for their high demand, low budget, invite only smartphone line, has put out their newest device – the OnePlus 3; and it has quite a lot going for it. Sitting at a comfy 64 GB of storage space, the phone can hold a vast amount of apps, and run plenty of them at the same time with its 6 GB of RAM. Although the CPU is not top of the line, it still boasts a mighty powerful Snapdragon 820 chip, as well as an average 1080p display. The 16 mega-pixel camera is no joke though, keeping up fairly well with top tier competitors such as Samsung and Apple, but unfortunately suffering in low-light photo taking. The kicker to what seems like an average phone for its competition is the fact that OnePlus puts the entire package at a reasonably affordable $400. In the unlocked smartphone market, this is a ridiculously good price for a brand new phone. For those looking for a fairly priced, off contract phone that won’t be catching its breath every time you open six or seven apps, the OnePlus 3 is a solid pick.

[url=https://www.engadget.com/2016/06/29/amds-radeon-rx-480-is-the-new-king-of-budget-video-cards/#/][b]AMD’s Radeon RX 480 Runs VR and 1440p for Only $200 [/b][/url]
With a new batch of graphics cards popping out from both Nvidia and AMD, Nvidia has made it clear that they are going for sheer power with their newest lines of cards. On the other hand, AMD has shown its goal is not just power output, but also cost. One of the card’s goals was to meet the GPU-hungry VR specs while keeping costs low, and I’d say the card did just that. Encased in the card is a single fan in what looks like a simple black box design. Don’t let the single fan fool you though, this card can handle its fair share of games. In fact, it performance tests run by technology website Engadget, the RX 480 8 GB scored around half as well as Nvidia’s new GTX 1080. With the GTX 1080 being three times the price, the score shows the 480’s great price-to-performance cost. The only issue consumers may face with the card, is the high temperatures while idle and gaming, which is commonly seen in AMD graphics cards. For under $300, AMD’s new card accomplishes what the company set out to do – put out a GPU that is VR ready, runs 1440p, and will not break the bank.
[/align]

    [color=transparent]       [/color]

    [align=center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Tg4Iwrl.png[/img][/align]

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/resident-evil-7-demos-dummy-finger-has-a-purpose-c/1100-6441448/][color=white]The Dummy Finger Mystery is Solved![/color][/url][/b]
Well, kind of. The demo for Resident Evil 7, The Beginning, was released weeks ago, but gamers were left clueless in regards to one of the items that you acquire in the demo. The infamous dummy finger resulted in gamers clocking in countless hours trying to solve the mystery of its purpose. They changed audio settings, date settings, and even walked backwards throughout the demo! They still couldn't find a use for it. It is safe to say that anything that could be thought of was tried. Unfortunately, the mystery was left unresolved. Most came to the conclusion that the dummy finger served no purpose as its name implies. They were partially right. Capcom has revealed in an email sent to Resident Evil Ambassador program members that the finger does have a use, but "the path for now is closed." The countless hours that gamers put into the demo were in vain. The dummy finger currently doesn't serve any purpose, but it will eventually. Most speculate that Capcom will be releasing another demo in September because of the [url=http://static1.gamespot.com/uploads/scale_large/1551/15511094/3089104-re7_finger.jpg]photo[/url] included in the email features a dummy finger placed over a desk calendar on the September page. Capcom will be making an official announcement for the masses soon, but wanted to give more information to its ambassador members first. It is unclear if the announcement will include more information regarding a demo or something grander. Resident Evil 7 releases for PS4, Xbox One, and PC on January 24, 2017.

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/left-4-dead-3-might-have-been-teased-by-valve-empl/1100-6441428/][color=white]Left 4 Dead 3 Might Have Been Teased By Valve Employee![/color][/url][/b]
It's been 7 years since Left 4 Dead 2 was released and there has been little word since about a third game. However, every now and then there will be a little hint that fans of the series stumble upon. Conceptual artist, Tristan Reidford, posted a [url=http://static2.gamespot.com/uploads/scale_large/1539/15391776/3088655-tristan-l4d3-folder-tease.png]picture [/url]in his tutorial on Destinations Workshop Tools of a file directory, and at the top of the list of folders is one titled "Left 4 Dead 3." It was quickly taken down once it was pointed out, but fans of the series had already saved it before anything was done. You do have to take into consideration that it is just a folder and that Valve employees could have Portal 3 and Half Life 3 folders as well regardless of whether they're in development or not. It is curious, though, that the Left 4 Dead 3 folder was at the top of the list of folders. It is also part of a long string of information leaks. In 2013, Dota 2 fans touring Valve's office found a Left 4 Dead 3 listing. In 2014, the co-creator of Counter-Strike, who no longer works at Valve, stated that Left 4 Dead 3 was in development at that time and "looks great." There is no official confirmation as of now, but keep your eyes peeled for some big news regarding the future of the Left 4 Dead series!

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/heavy-rain-devs-new-ps4-game-aims-to-push-the-limi/1100-6441394//][color=white]Quantic Dream Aims to "Push the Limit" With New Visual Features[/color][/url][/b]
Quantic Dream boss, David Cage, recently had much to say about the developer's new engine that they're using for their latest game, Detroit: Become Human. Cage claimed the developer's new engine allows for new strides as it relates to cinematography. "We wanted to push the limits with Detroit and have an engine that would offer us more features regarding cinematography in particular," Cage informed the PlayStation Blog. "So we wanted to work on realistic lighting, especially. So we developed an entirely new engine from scratch pretty much." Quantic Dream worked on a myriad of new visual elements and features, including skin and hair shaders, as well as a visual feature that illuminates a character's ear when there is light behind it. Quantic Dream has clearly put a lot of work into making Detroit a beautifully polished game, but they also understand that not everyone cares about what is under the hood. Cage stated that he understands the technology behind games is only interesting for "nerds and geeks", but hopes that everyone will appreciate the final product on their screen.

    [color=transparent]     [/color]

    [align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v2/HackingNews.png[/img][/align]
[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4413]Phіus[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[url=https://www.hackread.com/turkish-hacker-hacks-arizona-state-websites/][b][color=white]Arizona Hacks[/color][/b][/url]
Several US government websites including the official Arizona State website were recently defaced by a Turkish hacker going under the alias "aLem", an avid football supporter who went as far as putting his club's logo on his defacement page, this was similar to the South Yorkshire Police website hack by a group of Albanian hackers who also placed a logo of their football club on the defacement page. The two other websites featured in this hack were the Arizona House of Representatives and the Arizona State Legislature websites, all three had the same defacement page.

[url=http://www.ehackingnews.com/2016/07/swift-hackers-take-off-10-million-from.html][b][color=white]$10,000,000 Stolen From a Ukranian Bank[/color][/b][/url]
Dozens of banking and financial institutions were compromised, supposedly due to a SWIFT exploit, including $951 million dollars in transfer requests to a hacker's New York Federal Reserve account. Other victims were the Bangladesh Central Bank, Banco del Austro, and a recently attacked Ukranian bank who's name hasn't been disclosed where $10 million were apparently stolen by a hacker. Swift CEO, Gottfried Leibbrandt warned banks to tighten their security or risk suspension from the SWIFT network.

[url=http://thehackernews.com/2016/06/world-check-terrorism-database.html][b][color=white]Terrorism Database Leak[/color][/b][/url]
It's rumored that an outdated version of the World-Check database was leaked, and [i][url=https://www.reddit.com/user/FoundTheStuff]Chris Vickery[/url][/i] recently claimed to have obtained a copy of this database. A database used by governments, banks, and intelligence agencies worldwide to identify potential threats. The database is said to contain 2.2 million records of suspected terrorists, money launderers, and countless other criminals. Vickery told media outlets that even after informing Thomson Reuters, the organization which runs World-Check, of where the leak is located, they still haven't taken it down.

    [color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][b][i]By [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=712376]Joey[/url][/i][/b][/align]

[url=http://www.eonline.com/news/777366/rihanna-and-drake-are-dating-again-he-still-loves-her-and-never-stopped][b][color=white]Drake and Rihanna are Dating Again[/color][/b][/url]
The two notorious artists, Drake and Rihanna, are now officially public about their relationship status. As of late, the two have proven to be in a relationship now and are proud of it, based off of recent media posted on social media networks. The two started collaborating together in 2010 with Rihanna's song, "What's My Name". The next year Rihanna featured in Drake's album, "Take Care", in the song "Take Care". In Drake's most recent album, Rihanna made an appearance in "Too Good". The two have received a substantial amount of support and love from their fans on social media networks.

[url=http://www.eonline.com/news/777116/kylie-jenner-and-tyga-are-back-together-why-their-breakup-made-them-a-stronger-couple][b][color=white]Kylie Jenner and Tyga are Back Together[/color][/b][/url]
The on-and-off couple appear to officially be in a relationship once again in light of recent events. The two originally started dating in October 2014, but in November 2015, the two broke up coincidentally on Tyga's 26th birthday, but started seeing each other again shortly after this incident. The couple has definitely had shared their rough patches. In May 2016, the two split up due to the relationship being complicated, E! Online reports. A source says, "They needed a reset. Kylie is happy. She feels like she needed the time apart but it's fate."

[url=http://www.eonline.com/news/777545/katy-perry-ex-john-mayer-reunite-during-her-date-with-orlando-bloom][b][color=white]Katy Perry and John Mayer Reunite[/color][/b][/url]
Katy Perry and John Mayer reunite, while Katy and her boyfriend, Orlando Bloom, went out for a "romantic dinner". Talk about awkward! In case you are not aware, Katy Perry and John Mayer have definitely had a "hot and cold" relationship until around July 2015 in where it has remained cold. The two have departed ways and did not seem to be alarmed or anything when encountering each other at the Sunset Tower Hotel's Tower Bar. In fact, the two appeared to have been chatting and Bloom did not mind at all. The restaurant is located in a hotel where there are numerous clubs and restaurants, some in which Mayer has been spotted at on numerous occasions.

    [color=transparent]         [/color]
